title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin says the Heat have zero room for error after last night's game if they hope to win the series against the Celtics. The Mavericks need to take a page from the Warriors book and build a defensive team around Luka Doncic. Doc Rivers would be the perfect head coach to fit the egos and age of the Lakers, and Baker Mayfield is going to have a real tough time being anyone's franchise quarterback.

 

Guest: Dan Woike

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
